DOC.brief_summary: Regulated negative pressure-assisted wound therapy (RNPT) is regarded as a gold standard technology for treatment of various chronic and acute wounds. The investigators plan to evaluate the efficacy and ease of use of this device.
DOC.brief_title: Regulated Negative Pressure-Assisted Wound Therapy Device
DOC.criteria: Chronic or acute wounds Uncontrolled bleeding Neoplasms in wound Exposed blood vessels Exposed internal organs
